component.name: addRowsColumnsData
component.description: Append row/rows/column/columns of data.

component.name: deleteDimensionBatchRequest
component.description: removing rows, columns and remove part of a row or column.

component.name: getCellData
component.description: Retrieve any set of cell data from a sheet and cell contents as input values (as would be entered by a user at a keyboard) and/or the outputs of formula (if numeric)

component.name: getMultipleCellData
component.description: Retrieve any set of cell data including multiple ranges from a sheet and cell contents as input values (as would be entered by a user at a keyboard) and/or the outputs of formula (if numeric)

component.name: editCell
component.description: Edit the content of the cell with new values.

component.name: editMultipleCell
component.description: Edit the content of multiple cell with new values.

component.name: updateCellsBatchRequest
component.description: Updates all cells in a range with new data that can be cell value, formatting.

component.name: appendDimensionBatchRequest
component.description: Append empty rows or columns at the end of the sheet.

component.name: updateBordersBatchRequest
component.description: Edit cell borders

component.name: repeatCellsBatchRequest
component.description: Repeat formatting of the cell into over a range of cells.

component.name: mergeCellsBatchRequest
component.description: Merge range of cells into a one cell.

component.name: setDataValidationBatchRequest
component.description: Apply data validation rule to a range.

component.name: copyPasteBatchRequest
component.description: Copy cell formatting in one range and paste it into another range on the same sheet.

component.name: cutPasteBatchRequest
component.description: cuts the one range and pastes its data, formats, formulas, and merges to the another range on the same sheet.

component.name: updateConditionalFormatRuleBatchRequest
component.description: Update a conditional formatting rule or its priority.

component.name: addConditionalFormatRuleBatchRequest
component.description: Establishes a new conditional formatting rule.

component.name: deleteConditionalFormatRuleBatchRequest
component.description: Delete a conditional formatting rule.

component.name: updateDimensionPropertiesBatchRequest
component.description: Adjust column width or row height.

component.name: autoResizeDimensionsBatchRequest
component.description: Automatically resize a column.

component.name: insertDimensionBatchRequest
component.description: Insert an empty row or column at the end or in the middle.

component.name: moveDimensionBatchRequest
component.description: Move a row or column / range of rows or columns.

component.name: sortRangeBatchRequest
component.description: Sort a range with multiple sorting specifications.
